/usr/bin/c++    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/bomberman.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/bomberman.dir/src/map.cpp.o CMakeFiles/bomberman.dir/src/getMapCoor.cpp.o CMakeFiles/bomberman.dir/src/player.cpp.o CMakeFiles/bomberman.dir/src/bomb.cpp.o CMakeFiles/bomberman.dir/src/menu.cpp.o CMakeFiles/bomberman.dir/src/Ia.cpp.o CMakeFiles/bomberman.dir/src/Bonus.cpp.o  -o bomberman  -lIrrlicht -lsfml-audio
